definition: balcony/patio/flat roof/terrace/deck (unroofed platform)/outdoor stage/ancient imperial celestial observation terrace
dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose

sentences.english: Meadow planting. New island beds directly adjacent to the water, were designed into the new patio.
sentences.chinese: 直接與水體毗鄰的草坪種植島被設計成新的露臺。

sentences.english: Grandpa grows several pots of flower on the balcony.
sentences.chinese: 爺爺在露臺上養了幾盆花。

sentences.english: Waxed meat hanging at the balcony.
The project has 145 square meters on two floors and a terrace.
sentences.chinese: 該項目有145平方米，有兩層樓和一個露臺。

sentences.english: The hotel terrace has views of the Plaza de España and the María Luisa Park.
sentences.chinese: 酒店露臺享有西班牙廣場和瑪麗亞路易莎公園的景緻。

sentences.english: At the far end of the first floor, sliding glass doors lead out from the kitchen onto a terrace.
sentences.chinese: 在一樓的盡端，廚房的滑動玻璃門可通向露臺。

sentences.english: The second floor has a home theater and a sunbathing deck above the master bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 二樓有一個家庭影院，在主臥上方有供日光浴的露臺。

sentences.english: My mother was sitting on the patio, drinking tonic water when I got home.
sentences.chinese: 回到家的時候，媽媽坐在露臺上，喝着湯力水。

sentences.english: The bedrooms are rearranged on the first level to accommodate the living space and terrace.
sentences.chinese: 臥室被安置在首層，以適應起居空間和露臺空間。

sentences.english: Guests at the Palma Hotel can relax at the beach or on the sun terrace.
sentences.chinese: 每間住處均設有私人浴室，且酒店前設有陽光露臺。

sentences.english: Sightseeing terrace may look at the Tianhe District's modern beautiful scene.
sentences.chinese: 觀光露臺可盡覽天河區的現代美景。

sentences.english: Finally, build the big gazebo that when buying a house, gives room of a party.
sentences.chinese: 最後，把買房時贈予的大露臺建成一個聚會場所。

sentences.english: A section of the upper storey juts out to shelter the decked area leading to the entrance.
sentences.chinese: 樓上的一部分凸出來遮蔽了通往入口的露臺區域。

sentences.english: R oom decoration, upright, developers all bright house types, send 12 square balcony.
sentences.chinese: 房型正氣，開發商裝修，全明房型，送12平方露臺。

sentences.english: The hotel has a pool with bar and spacious sun terrace with loungers and umbrellas.
sentences.chinese: 酒店設有一個游泳池和一間連帶迷人海景露臺的餐廳。

sentences.english: Instead she slipped into a hooded robe and stepped out onto her terrace.
sentences.chinese: 於是她披上帶帽袍子踏入了她的露臺。

definition: variant of 陽臺|阳台[yang2 tai2]
top floor/attic/loft/garret/penthouse/(flat) rooftop (often used as an outdoor living area etc)
promenade/long hallway/Long Corridor in the Summer Palace, Beijing 北京頤和園|北京颐和园[Bei3 jing1 Yi2 he2 yuan2]
to take in the whole scene at once/to have a panoramic view
green grass like cushion (idiom); green meadow so inviting to sleep on
